Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
Cancel
i want to talk with human
Sure, I can help with that. I'll send an email to our support team to get you connected with a human representative.
hello
Hi there! How can I assist you today?
can you please approve my ads its under review its been 4 days now

I'm sorry to hear that your ads have been under review for so long. Typically, we review ads within 4 hours on weekdays and up to 8 hours on weekends. Let me check the status for you. Could you please provide me with your ad account details or any reference number related to the ad?
Thank you for providing the Ad ID. I'll escalate this issue to our support team to expedite the review process. You should receive an update soon.
how much time take ?
Once the issue is escalated, it typically takes a few hours to get an update. However, it can vary depending on the volume of requests. I'll make sure to prioritize your request.
thank you so much i appreciate your help
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out.
i want to talk with agent
Sure, I'll notify our support team to connect you with a human representative. You should hear from them soon.
i want to talk with human
No problem, I'll notify our support team to connect you with a human representative. You should hear from them soon.
Philip Pirrip is talking to you.
Hi .. Could you please share your Account Id?

Message:
Hi,
Thank you for your interest in working with the NewsBreak Ad Platform. Unfortunately, we were unable to verify your account and domain based on the information provided. 

As a result, your account will remain on hold pending further review by our Ad Operations and Trust & Safety teams.

To proceed with the verification process and have your account approved, please provide the following details by responding here or emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
1. Company’s full address
2. Company’s legal entity name
3. Company’s EHID or DUNS number
4. Primary contact person’s name
5. Company’s phone number

Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status.

We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out.
